an6.22:1.1: “Chayime, bhikkhave, aparihāniye dhamme desessāmi, taṁ suṇātha …pe…
an6.22:1.2: katame ca, bhikkhave, cha aparihāniyā dhammā?
an6.22:1.3: Na kammārāmatā, na bhassārāmatā, na niddārāmatā, na saṅgaṇikārāmatā, sovacassatā, kalyāṇamittatā—
an6.22:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha aparihāniyā dhammā.
an6.22:2.1: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atītamaddhānaṁ na parihāyiṁsu kusalehi dhammehi, sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi na parihāyiṁsu kusalehi dhammehi.
an6.22:2.2: Yepi hi keci, bhikkhave, anāgatamaddhānaṁ na parihāyissanti kusalehi dhammehi, sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi na parihāyissanti kusalehi dhammehi.
an6.22:2.3: Yepi hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi na parihāyanti kusalehi dhammehi, sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi na parihāyanti kusalehi dhammehī”ti.
